m_szDocTitle: Tesla Partner Nvidia Smashes Q1 Views On 'Sweeping' AI Adoption | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Partner Nvidia Smashes Q1 Views On 'Sweeping' AI Adoption (Nvidia) Reprints Tesla Motors ( TSLA ) partner Nvidia ( NVDA ) rocketed late Thursday after the maker of graphics chips beat Q1 sales expectations and topped earnings views by a penny, led by faster adoption of artificial intelligence technology that utilizes Nvidia graphics chips. In after-hours trading after its earnings release, Nvidia stock was up nearly 6%, rebounding from a 1.4% dip, to 35.57, in the regular session. Shares are up 8% for the year. For Q1, Nvidia reported $1.3 billion in sales and 33 cents earnings per share
